benchmark_details.name: WINDOWS AGENT ARENA
benchmark_details.overview: WINDOWS AGENT ARENA is a benchmark suite that envelops a real Windows OS environment, allowing agents to interact with a variety of applications and web domains. It provides 154 diverse multi-step tasks focused on the Windows OS with scalable and parallelized evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate multi-modal agents operating within a Windows OS environment through a set of tasks.

data.source: 150+ tasks designed to operate within the Windows OS.
data.annotation: Tasks involve automated evaluation scripts and initial configuration settings.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on task completion success in a multi-step evaluation.
methodology.interpretation: A higher success rate indicates better agent performance.
methodology.baseline_results: The best configuration achieves a 19.5% success rate in the Windows domain.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through quantitative and qualitative analysis of agent performance.
